data.name: The Wickie Demo
data.detailed_description:
A Lovecraftian voyage into the unknown, welcome to the demo of The Wickie. In this episode set just before the main game begins, you will be onboard a ship and traveling to The Rock to begin your life as a probationary lighthouse keeper. Will you sit out the journey? Will you talk to people? Will you look at what is happening around you?
There is no one way we want you to use this demo. Like the game, you can choose to just do nothing, or you can explore and see what you find. Perhaps you might get some clues on the way. Perhaps it might explain why you see things the way you do? Are those sailors plotting against you? Just who is that geologist? Why are all these books going to the island?
Some questions can be answered, however, you will have to play this H.P. Lovecraft-inspired story to find out more. Then perhaps you will be ready to begin working at The Rock.

The Wickie is a 3d first-person adventure game, featuring an open-world environment called Pandora's Rock. Or The Rock for short. On the beautiful island of Pandoras Rock you, playing Bill Fisher, will be thrown into the Outer Hebrides back in 1936. War is on the horizon, the world is in turmoil and safe shipping is essential. While learning how to be a Wickie, (slang for lighthouse keeper) you decide what you do. Will you work hard? Investigate a bit? Explore? Fall over a cliff and be eaten by a strange green thing? Go more insane?
This chapter is an introduction to the game's main character Bill. He has recently moved jobs for his health and we find him on his way to The Rock. The majority of the journey is done and he is now on deck waiting for the island to come into view. How relaxing!

There are a lot of choices and a lot of endings in the full version of The Wickie. The demo has a few...

fullgame.name: The Wickie; Journey of a Lighthouse Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1060 6GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is an early beta and therefore it may suffer slowdown on lower spec machines due to not being completely optimized yet.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 2X series or equivalent with 8GB Ram
  • Storage: 13 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
